DataElement.preferredName: Patient Benign Ethnic Neutropenia Diagnosis Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator of whether patient has been diagnosed with benign ethnic neutropenia (BEN).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Chronic neutropenia in the absence of secondary causes, other cytopenia, splenomegaly, lymphadenopathy, or increased risk of infection. It occurs more frequently in individuals of African, Middle Eastern, and West Indian descent._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Chronic neutropenia in the absence of secondary causes, other cytopenia, splenomegaly, lymphadenopathy, or increased risk of infection. Concepts.definition: Chronic neutropenia in the absence of secondary causes, other cytopenia, splenomegaly, lymphadenopathy, or increased risk of infection. It occurs more frequently in individuals of African, Middle Eastern, and West Indian descent.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
